attributes.action: Fund increased research into mitochondrial disease
attributes.additional_details: The Government should fund increased research into mitochondrial disease, to learn more about the disease, develop treatment options and hopefully identify a cure.
attributes.background: There is increasing awareness of mitochondrial disease, and the importance of early diagnosis and care, yet there is no cure for the disease, and treatment options are limited.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
